translation.ja: やめろ！

translation.en: Hey, get off me!
translation.ja: 離してくれ

translation.en: Jesus said, You have to put me before other people,
translation.ja: 主は言われた “他人や自分自身より―”

translation.en: and you have to put me before yourself.
translation.ja: “私を優先せよ”と

translation.en: Hitler-- That was a demand, to be in the Nazi party.
translation.ja: ヒトラーは ナチスでは絶対だった

translation.en: They had to put the Nazi party and its objectives
translation.ja: 両親や兄弟姉妹―

translation.en: ahead of their father, mother, brother, sister, and their own life.
translation.ja: 自分自身の命より ナチスの方針が優先された

translation.en: That was a covenant. A pledge.
translation.ja: これが誓約なのだ

translation.en: But the real work is invisible.
translation.ja: 真になすべきことは

translation.en: And it is invisibly spreading.
translation.ja: 秘密裏に行うべきだ

translation.en: The more you can make your organization invisible, the more influence it'll have.
translation.ja: 組織を表舞台から 遠ざけるほど影響力は増す

translation.en: They will accuse me of betraying their trust.
translation.ja: 僕は信頼を裏切った

translation.en: In a fundamental way, I did. They want to be a secret, invisible organization. I wrote two books about them.
translation.ja: 彼らの秘密結社に関する本を 僕が２冊も書いたからだ

translation.en: But the story is no longer just about my experience.
translation.ja: この話は 思わぬ広がりを見せた

translation.en: It took a long time before I realized just who the Family was,
translation.ja: ファミリーの実態と我が国の 政界に及ぼす影響を―

translation.en: and the influence they have had in the leadership of our country.
translation.ja: 理解するには時間がかかった

translation.en: This was a group with tentacles around the world,
translation.ja: この集団は 世界に触手を伸ばす

translation.en: meeting with presidents, foreign leaders,
translation.ja: 大統領や各国の元首と会い―

translation.en: to spread their view of Jesus throughout the world.
translation.ja: 彼らのキリスト観を 世界に広めている

translation.en: The National Prayer Breakfast:
translation.ja: 全米祈祷(きとう)朝食会は ワシントンの恒例行事で

translation.en: a Washington institution for Republican and Democratic presidents
translation.ja: 全米祈祷(きとう)朝食会は ワシントンの恒例行事で 両党の歴代大統領が参加する

translation.en: since Eisenhower.
translation.ja: 両党の歴代大統領が参加する

translation.en: I want to thank all those inside and outside of Congress who made this all possible.
translation.ja: この会を実現させた すべての人に感謝をささげる

translation.en: They said he's the most powerful man in Washington you've never heard of.
translation.ja: 彼はワシントンで 最も力のある無名の男

translation.en: He's like the Wizard of Oz.
translation.ja: オズの魔法使いよ

translation.en: I wish I could say more about it, but it's working precisely because it is private.
translation.ja: 非公開な会だからこそ 力が発揮される

translation.en: We need to reach leaders. And then if you reach the leaders, then the whole nation will be influenced for Christ.
translation.ja: 指導者に接触することで キリストの影響を及ぼす

translation.en: The notion was floated: What if we lived together?
translation.ja: 同じ家に住んだら？

translation.en: I was part of a group called C Street when I was in Washington.
translation.ja: Ｃストリートに属していた

translation.en: Governor Mark Sanford, Senator John Ensign, all embroiled in scandal...
translation.ja: サンフォード州知事や エンシン議員の醜聞

translation.en: Doing the Lord's work in the devil's playground.
translation.ja: 悪魔の領域で神の業をなす

translation.en: We meet with some really horrible people. Dictators and murderers and thieves.
translation.ja: 独裁者 殺人犯 窃盗犯など 恐ろしい者たちにも会う

translation.en: If I were a bad faith actor from another country,
translation.ja: 悪意を持った外国人なら―

translation.en: that is exactly the kind of meeting that I would want to exploit.
translation.ja: この会を利用しない手はない

translation.en: Everybody in the room had their hands on this President- elect.
translation.ja: 皆が次期大統領の 肩に手を置いた

translation.en: This is what the Family's been waiting for. He's God's man.
translation.ja: 彼こそファミリーの 待ち望んだ神の男だ

translation.en: And they say it's about faith, but there's a shared understanding
translation.ja: 彼らは信仰と言うけれど 私たちの共通認識は

translation.en: that what we're really about here is power.
translation.ja: これが 権力闘争ということです

translation.en: I lived with those guys, prayed with them at their headquarters at the seat of their power.
translation.ja: 僕は彼らの本拠地で 彼らと共に暮らし 祈った

translation.en: There were congressmen, senators, world leaders.
translation.ja: 連邦議員や 各国の国家元首がいた

translation.en: An invisible organization that had been hiding in plain sight for over 80 years.
translation.ja: 80年以上 暗躍してきた 秘密結社だったんだ

translation.en: People think that there's something sinister. There has to be a conspiracy.
translation.ja: 何か邪悪な陰謀があると 言う者もいるが―

translation.en: It's the furthest thing from the truth.
translation.ja: まったくの誤解だ

translation.en: It's a breathtaking enmeshment of Church and State.
translation.ja: 驚くべき 宗教の政治介入と言える

translation.en: A humble example of leadership that the world has never seen.
translation.ja: 世界に類を見ない リーダーシップの謙虚な例だ

translation.en: - That's a corruption of democracy. - It's the power of God.
translation.ja: 民主主義の崩壊 神の力だ

translation.en: This is something that the world desperately needs.
translation.ja: 世界が必要としている

translation.en: Hark! All worry will be left behind.
translation.ja: NETFLIX オリジナルドキュメンタリー 聞け　すべての 悩みは解決し―

translation.en: All disappointment, too, will be gone forever.
translation.ja: 失望も永遠に 消え去るだろう

translation.en: We adopted a program for a worldwide spiritual offensive.
translation.ja: 世界規模の精神攻撃へ 対処を採用

translation.en: I know, as never before.
translation.ja: 我々は皆 神の子だと―

translation.en: that we are all God's children.
translation.ja: かつてないほど 実感している

translation.en: There is only one thing we can take with us through that door.
translation.ja: その扉から 持ち出せるのは１つだけ

translation.en: Those whom we have led to the Savior.
translation.ja: 我々が救い主へと 導いた者たちだけだ

translation.en: Fear him. Love him. Submit yourself completely.
translation.ja: 彼を恐れ 愛し 自分の身を投じれば

translation.en: Then you will be His disciple.
translation.ja: 主の使徒になれる

translation.en: What we have begun, we will finish.
translation.ja: 我々が始め 我々が終わらせる

translation.en: One of the things I've always found interesting, even as a boy,
translation.ja: 小さい頃から僕の 興味をそそったのは―

translation.en: is the idea that there are these battles between good and evil;
translation.ja: 常に善と悪の戦いが あるということだ

translation.en: that we are actively engaged in a war with the forces of evil every day,
translation.ja: 僕らは悪の力と 日々 戦いを繰り広げる

translation.en: and that there are demonic influences in our lives,
translation.ja: 人生には 悪魔の誘惑がついて回る

translation.en: and that you have to be on guard.
translation.ja: 防御が必要だ

translation.en: So as a boy, this, on the one hand, makes the world a much scarier place.
translation.ja: 悪が存在する世界を 恐ろしく感じたが― 悪が存在する世界を 恐ろしく感じたが― ジェフ･シャーレット 「ファミリー」著者

translation.en: On the other hand, it makes the world a more exciting place.
translation.ja: ジェフ･シャーレット 「ファミリー」著者 同時に興奮もした

translation.en: My mother died of breast cancer.
translation.ja: 母は若くして 乳がんで亡くなった

translation.en: Um... She was young, and I was just a kid.
translation.ja: まだ僕が幼い頃だ

translation.en: She grew up in vaguely Pentecostal Christianity.
translation.ja: 母はペンテコステ派の キリスト教徒で

translation.en: And as she lay dying, she would invite members of various faiths in to pray with her.
translation.ja: 死の直前 宗派の違う人々が 祈りをささげに来た

translation.en: And I noticed some of them prayed for her salvation,
translation.ja: 母の救済を祈る人々もいた

translation.en: that she would become a member of their faith, even in death.
translation.ja: 彼らの宗派に 宗旨替えするよう祈っていた

translation.en: And some of them prayed for her deliverance,
translation.ja: 解放を祈る者もいた

translation.en: for a reprieve from her suffering, so that she might live longer.
translation.ja: 苦痛に猶予を与え 長く生きられるようにと

translation.en: And that question of deliverance versus salvation,
translation.ja: 解放と救済 どちらを選ぶべきなのか

translation.en: the world to come or freedom now,
translation.ja: 死後の世界か 今の自由か という問いが

translation.en: really struck me,
translation.ja: 僕の心に残った

translation.en: and has lead me into all the stories that I've been interested in ever since.
translation.ja: そしてその疑問に 深い興味を持つようになった 〝創世記11章６節 バベル これは アメリカじゃない〞 そしてその疑問に 深い興味を持つようになった

translation.en: When I was in my early 20s, I decided to write about religion.
translation.ja: 20代の頃 宗教について書くと決めた 20代の頃 宗教について書くと決めた 〝突き止めたい〞

translation.en: And I was living in New York, working on this book,
translation.ja: ニューヨークで 本を執筆していた時―

translation.en: and I'd heard that an old friend of mine, a man named Luke, was in town.
translation.ja: ルークという名の旧友が 近くにいると聞いた

translation.en: Luke was a very promising guy,
translation.ja: ルークは前途有望で―

translation.en: from a sort of an upper- class family, and had a fine trajectory to his life.
translation.ja: 上流社会に属し 将来も嘱望されていた

translation.en: Engaged to be married, and building a financial career.
translation.ja: 婚約し金融業界で キャリアを積んでいた

translation.en: But then he left all that
translation.ja: だが彼はすべてを捨て

translation.en: and moved across the country to join, um, what his family feared was a cult.
translation.ja: カルト集団と思われる 組織に加わったらしかった

translation.en: He seemed to just drop out, just to disappear.
translation.ja: こつ然と姿を消した

translation.en: And so his family said, because they knew I wrote about religion,
translation.ja: 心配した彼の家族から 依頼があり

translation.en: they said, Would you meet with him and sort of see what he's up to?
translation.ja: ルークに会うことになった

translation.en: This was very shortly after 9/11.
translation.ja: 911の直後だった

translation.en: And one of the things he said he was there for-- He wanted to survey the ruins of secularism.
translation.ja: 彼は世俗趣味の崩壊を 調べたいと言っていた

translation.en: But he said, Now we see clearly. This is a battle between good and evil.
translation.ja: 善と悪の戦いが 起きているとも語っていた

translation.en: He seems to be a transformed person.
translation.ja: まるで別人だった

translation.en: And he told me about this amorphous thing that he had joined.
translation.ja: そして彼が属す 集団について話してくれた

translation.en: - He says...  - They're not Christians.
translation.ja: キリスト教じゃない

translation.en: We're followers of Jesus, and we just serve.
translation.ja: 僕らは奉仕しているんだ

translation.en: Who do you serve?
translation.ja: 誰に？

translation.en: Men who are chosen by God for leadership.
translation.ja: 神に選ばれし指導者に

translation.en: Politicians.
translation.ja: 政治家だ

translation.en: - Is there an organization? - No.
translation.ja: 組織なの？ いや

translation.en: No church, no ministers, no rules and rituals.
translation.ja: 教会も聖職者も 戒律も儀式もない

translation.en: You read the Bible, though, right?
translation.ja: 聖書は読む？

translation.en: Sure, sure, but mostly, we work.
translation.ja: 読むけど 作業のほうが多い

translation.en: We... rake leaves, play basketball, clean toilets.
translation.ja: 落ち葉を掃き バスケをし トイレを清掃する

translation.en: Wait, you clean toilets... for politicians?
translation.ja: 政治家のために トイレ掃除をするのか？

translation.en: I know it sounds weird... - Yeah. - ...but it's not.
translation.ja: 変に聞こえるだろ？ でも違う

translation.en: It's just a bunch of guys living together.
translation.ja: 仲間と一緒に生活してる

translation.en: It's great.
translation.ja: 最高だよ

translation.en: It seemed so simple.
translation.ja: 単純に思えた

translation.en: And then he invited me to come see it for myself.
translation.ja: 彼は僕に見に来るよう誘った

translation.en: And knowing almost nothing of it, I did.
translation.ja: 予備知識のないまま 僕はそうした

translation.en: Do you take drugs, alcohol, or prescription medication?
translation.ja: ドラッグや酒の摂取 処方薬の服用はしてる？

translation.en: You only got in by being recommended.
translation.ja: 紹介が無いと入れない

translation.en: And had to go through a little interview at this office on Capitol Hill,
translation.ja: キャピトル･ヒルの事務所で 共和党の―

translation.en: with a senior aide to a Republican senator from Oklahoma at the time.
translation.ja: オクラホマ選出の 上院議員と面談した

translation.en: And do you have a girlfriend?
translation.ja: 恋人は？

translation.en: He asked me about my relationship with my girlfriend...
translation.ja: 僕の恋人との関係や…

translation.en: - Is she Christian? - Yeah.
translation.ja: キリスト教徒？

translation.en: ...and about my parents.
translation.ja: 両親のことも

translation.en: Questions that I would later come to understand were sort of testing how much was I willing to renounce.
translation.ja: 彼らと関係を断てるかを 試す質問だと後からわかった

translation.en: - And I answered them very honestly. -
translation.ja: 僕は正直に答えた

translation.en: Because you have to understand, I was in no way an investigative journalist at this time.
translation.ja: 当時は調査ジャーナリスト ではなかった

translation.en: - Were you close with your mom? - I was, yeah.
translation.ja: 母親との仲はいい？ ええ

translation.en: There was no stealth, no cleverness.
translation.ja: 身分を隠す気はなかった

translation.en: I told them I was a writer, and I'd been traveling around the country,
translation.ja: イエスについて調べ 国内を旅している―

translation.en: trying to understand all the different ideas of Jesus,
translation.ja: 作家だと名乗った

translation.en: and I was interested in getting to know theirs.
translation.ja: 彼らの考えも 知りたいと告げた

translation.en: Rent is $400. That's with room and board.
translation.ja: 家賃は食事つきで400ドルだ

translation.en: I think it was about a week later.
translation.ja: １週間後くらいたった頃

translation.en: I passed the test. I was welcome to come and just live with them
translation.ja: 僕はテストにパスし 彼らの一員になった

translation.en: and be a brother, as they put it.
translation.ja: つまりブラザーだ

translation.en: A group of the brothers had come to pick me up,
translation.ja: 何人かの迎えが来て―

translation.en: and they drove me across the river to Arlington, Virginia,
translation.ja: バージニア州 アーリントンに向かう

translation.en: a suburb of Washington where a lot of intelligence community folks live.
translation.ja: 情報機関関係者が多く住む ワシントン郊外の地域だ

translation.en: And we went down into this cul- de- sac
translation.ja: 袋小路の先に―

translation.en: and past this big, beautiful Georgian mansion.
translation.ja: ジョージ王朝様式の 美しい邸宅があった

translation.en: - Nice house, huh? - Yeah.
translation.ja: いい家だろ？

translation.en: Look, I didn't know how to explain you to the guys,
translation.ja: 新入りとしか説明してない

translation.en: so I just said that we're getting a new dude. He's from New York.
translation.ja: ＮＹから来た作家で―

translation.en: - He's a writer. He's Jewish. - Half- Jewish, actually.
translation.ja: ユダヤ系だとね 半分だけだ

translation.en: And he wants to know Jesus. Know what they said?
translation.ja: 彼らがどう反応したと思う？

translation.en: No.
translation.ja: さあ

translation.en: Bring him on.
translation.ja: 連れてこいと

translation.en: Let's go.
translation.ja: 行こう

translation.en: ♪ Everything to God in prayer ♪
translation.ja: 神にすべてを打ち明けよう

translation.en: ♪ Are there trials and temptations? ♪
translation.ja: 試練や誘惑が 待ち受けていても

translation.en: So, I move to this house called Ivanwald.
translation.ja: こうして アイヴァンウォルドに来た

translation.en: Guys? This is, uh, Jeff.
translation.ja: ジェフを紹介する

translation.en: It was buzzing with all these guys. Sort of a frat house kind of feel.
translation.ja: ざわざわして 大学の友愛会館のようだが―

translation.en: But no beer, no-- Nothing else, you know, very-- A pious frat house for God.
translation.ja: ビールも何もなく 神のための信心深い館だった

translation.en: ♪ The Lord in prayer... ♪
translation.ja: 主に祈ろう

translation.en: And pretty quickly, I realized this is not what I thought it was going to be.
translation.ja: 想像していたのとは 違うとすぐに気づいた

translation.en: - Jeff. - Hey, Jeff, welcome to Ivanwald.
translation.ja: どうも 館へようこそ

translation.en: - Thanks for having me. - Yeah.
translation.ja: ありがとう

translation.en: I think you're gonna enjoy staying here.
translation.ja: 滞在を楽しんでくれ

translation.en: - Let's get you settled in. - Yeah.
translation.ja: 案内しよう

translation.en: If you hang out in certain sectors around Washington, you've heard about it.
translation.ja: ワシントンにいれば 耳にしたことがあるはずだ

translation.en: There was a guy's house and a girl's house down the street,
translation.ja: 女子の家と 男子の家がある 女子の家と 男子の家がある ガノン･シムズ 元ブラザー

translation.en: and it was this little enclave,
translation.ja: ガノン･シムズ 元ブラザー 少人数での―

translation.en: sort of a sabbatical from regular life.
translation.ja: 日常生活からの長期休暇だ

translation.en: There were guys from all over the world, all walks of life.
translation.ja: メンバーは国も違えば 社会的地位も違う

translation.en: Religious, non- religious,
translation.ja: 信心深い者も―

translation.en: questioning, skeptical.
translation.ja: 懐疑的な者もいた

translation.en: It was raw. It was real.
translation.ja: すばらしい体験だ

translation.en: Little more like the 12 guys you read about in this-- this book, right?
translation.ja: この本に書かれた 12人の男とは違うね

translation.en: And as a young Christian working in politics,
translation.ja: 政界で働く 若きキリスト教徒として

translation.en: it was exactly what I needed. Yeah.
translation.ja: まさに 必要としていた場だった

translation.en: The regiment at Ivanwald was so precise it was relaxing.
translation.ja: 生活は規則的で 落ち着いていた

translation.en: No swearing, no drinking.
translation.ja: 悪態禁止　飲酒禁止

translation.en: No sex, no self.
translation.ja: セックス禁止　無私の精神

translation.en: You don't waste time on newspapers. Never watch TV.
translation.ja: 新聞やテレビもない生活

translation.en: ...steadfastly into heaven.
translation.ja: 断固として天国に…

translation.en: You eat meat. You study the gospels. You play basketball.
translation.ja: 肉を食べ教義を学び バスケをする

translation.en: - Yeah, here we go. - I got outside.
translation.ja: こっちだ

translation.en: God loves a man who can sink a three- pointer.
translation.ja: 神は３Ｐ(スリーポイント)シューターを愛す

translation.en: Hey, Jeff.
translation.ja: ジェフ

translation.en: Will you lead us in prayer?
translation.ja: 祈りを頼む

translation.en: Sure.
translation.ja: ああ

translation.en: Lord, uh, Lord God,
translation.ja: 主なる神よ

translation.en: uh, Heavenly Father.
translation.ja: 天の父よ

translation.en: Jesus, thank you so much for...
translation.ja: イエス様　感謝を

translation.en: the guys here, and...
translation.ja: ここにいる者たちと

translation.en: um, the chance to play basketball, and to...
translation.ja: バスケを共にプレーし

translation.en: to learn teamwork, and, um...
translation.ja: 協力を学び…

translation.en: And learn how to fight for you.
translation.ja: あなたのために闘う

translation.en: We pray all this in Jesus' name. Amen.
translation.ja: 主の御名において アーメン

translation.en: - Amen. - Amen.
translation.ja: アーメン

translation.en: The kind of storytelling that I've always found interesting
translation.ja: 僕が興味を引かれる物語は―

translation.en: is submerging of yourself in the lives of others.
translation.ja: 他者の生活への潜入だった

translation.en: Crossing into that world of belief until you're a little bit lost.
translation.ja: 信念の世界に入り込み 少し自分を見失う

translation.en: It's spiritually dangerous, in the sense that you could be converted.
translation.ja: 自分が変えられてしまう 危険をはらんでいる

translation.en: And at Ivanwald, it meant seeing what happens if, for a time at least,
translation.ja: アイヴァンウォルドで 少なくとも あの時は―

translation.en: I accepted their ideas.
translation.ja: 僕は彼らの考えを受け入れた

translation.en: Where shall I flee from your presence? If I ascend into heaven, you are there.
translation.ja: “私が天国に行っても あなたはそこにおられる”

translation.en: If I make my bed in the depths, you are there.
translation.ja: “黄泉(よみ)の床にいても”

translation.en: It's intense, right?
translation.ja: 厳しいよな

translation.en: It's like, you can't run.
translation.ja: 逃げ場はない

translation.en: Doesn't matter where you turn, 'cause Jesus is going to be right there, waiting for you.
translation.ja: どこへ逃げようと イエスが待っておられる

translation.en: Jesus is smart.
translation.ja: 頭がいいんだな

translation.en: He's going to get you.
translation.ja: 見られてるぞ

translation.en: Let's pray.
translation.ja: 祈ろう

translation.en: I call out to the Lord.
translation.ja: “私は声をあげ―”

translation.en: I pray to him for his favor.
translation.ja: “主に救いを求める”

translation.en: I praise you for I am fearful...
translation.ja: “主を恐れたたえる”

translation.ja: 我々は祈った

translation.en: We would pray to be nothing.
translation.ja: 自分を壊し 無にし

translation.en: We would pray to learn how to obey.
translation.ja: 従順になるために

translation.en: In here, we're safe with our brothers, learning the ways of Jesus.
translation.ja: 僕たちは イエスの教えを学び…

translation.en: They said this is our prime relationship with this Jesus.
translation.ja: それがイエスとの 重要な関係だと彼らは言った

translation.en: - Does that make sense to you? - Yeah.
translation.ja: 理解した？ ああ

translation.en: And so we would pray to crush what we would call our inner rebel.
translation.ja: 内なる反逆者を 打ちのめすため祈った

translation.en: - Jeff? - Hey.
translation.ja: ジェフ

translation.en: - I see you're writing a lot down. - Yeah.
translation.ja: よく書いてるけど

translation.en: But are you listening?
translation.ja: 聞いてる？

translation.en: I know it's a lot to take in, but this is all you really need.
translation.ja: 学ぶことは多いが 君に必要なことだ

translation.en: It's the Bible. It's the part that matters. It's just Jesus.
translation.ja: 聖書のイエスに 関わる部分の抜粋だ

translation.en: One of the things that surprised me was that
translation.ja: 僕が最も驚いたのは―

translation.en: though most of these men were very scripturally literate, they didn't care very much about the Bible.
translation.ja: 教養のある彼らが聖書を 重視していないことだった

translation.en: There was a small book that you're given.
translation.ja: 小さな本を渡された

translation.en: This little book that says Jesus.
translation.ja: “イエス”と書いてある

translation.en: That's it. Just Jesus, nothing else.
translation.ja: それ以外 何も書いていない

translation.en: And it was four gospels: Matthew, Mark, Luke, and John,
translation.ja: マタイ マルコ ルカ ヨハネの福音書

translation.en: with the Book of Acts referred to here as Acts of Ambassadors.
translation.ja: “大使の言行録”として 使徒言行録も載っていた

translation.en: And they didn't need to read too much further than that.
translation.ja: それ以外は ほぼ読まなかった

translation.en: There's not a whole lot of theology.
translation.ja: 神学論ではない

translation.en: There's no wrestling with God, with conscience,
translation.ja: 良心との闘いや悪魔 神との葛藤―

translation.en: traditional concerns of fundamentalism. They don't talk about the devil.
translation.ja: 原理主義的な懸念について 話さなかった

translation.en: Just Jesus. Just Jesus. That's all.
translation.ja: ただイエス　それだけだ

translation.en: Now, which part of Jesus was Psalm 137?
translation.ja: 詩編137のどこにいる？

translation.en: O daughter of Babylon who are to be destroyed,
translation.ja: “破壊者　バビロンの娘よ”

translation.en: happy shall he be that taketh the little ones and dasheth them against the stones.
translation.ja: “お前の幼子を捕え 岩に たたきつける者は幸いだ”

translation.en: Which part of Jesus would be in that?
translation.ja: どこに主の存在が？

translation.en: Jeff, brother, I don't know,
translation.ja: 知らないよ

translation.en: but I'm pretty sure he'll let you know when it's time.
translation.ja: 時が来れば 主 自らが教えてくれる

translation.ja: 彼らは 無知な者がキリスト教を―

translation.en: That all the rubes out there, the suckers,
translation.ja: 誤解していると主張した

translation.en: they think that Christ came to preach equally to everybody. Not so.
translation.ja: キリストは皆に平等に 教えを説いたのではないと

translation.en: They said he had rings of power. Closest are James and Peter.
translation.ja: 力の輪があり ヤコブとペテロが中心で

translation.en: Then you go out another circle, and there's the disciples.
translation.ja: その外の輪に 他の使徒たちがいる

translation.en: And out here... is everybody else, and they'll get the message,
translation.ja: さらに外には その他 大勢がいる

translation.en: but they won't get it in unvarnished form. They can't handle the truth.
translation.ja: だが彼らに あからさまな 真実は受け入れられない

translation.en: Let us be nothing.
translation.ja: 人を愛せよ

translation.en: But now we've moved from this outer ring to one of those very near inner circles.
translation.ja: 僕らは外側の輪から 中心へと移ろうとしていた

translation.en: - And we are the new chosen. - Please, Jesus...
translation.ja: 僕らは選ばれし者で―

translation.en: - The ones that matter. - ...work through us.
translation.ja: 重要人物だ

translation.en: As a brother in Ivanwald, as one among these new chosen,
translation.ja: 選ばれしブラザーとして 僕たちは―

translation.en: some of us were assigned to work in their headquarters called the Cedars.
translation.ja: 本部シダーズでの 仕事を仰せつかった

translation.en: We would rake leaves. We'd clean toilets.
translation.ja: 落ち葉を掃き トイレを掃除した

translation.en: I thought this was so absurd,
translation.ja: バカげてると思った

translation.en: this religious movement of humbling yourself
translation.ja: 宗教活動で 謙虚さを学びながら

translation.en: by cleaning the toilets of the powerful.
translation.ja: 権力者のトイレ掃除

translation.en: Load some of these up.
translation.ja: 運ぶよ

translation.ja: そこは白い柱のある大邸宅で ホワイトハウスに似ていた

translation.en: And it is very clearly the seat of their power,

translation.en: because it's where they host a lot of foreign leaders.
translation.ja: 外国の元首も 出入りしていたから

translation.ja: あの男 知ってる

translation.en: That's that, uh, Republican Senator from Oklahoma.
translation.ja: オクラホマ選出の 共和党議員だ

translation.ja: ああ　みんなが来る

translation.en: Left, right,
translation.ja: 左派 右派

translation.en: Republican, Democrat.
translation.ja: 共和党 民主党

translation.en: But those terms don't reflect the movement's vision.
translation.ja: だけどこの運動のビジョンは そんな違いより―

translation.en: It's bigger than that.
translation.ja: 大きいんだ

translation.en: We had the president of Uganda here the other day.
translation.ja: この前 ウガンダの大統領が来て

translation.en: We prayed for him.
translation.ja: 彼のため祈った

translation.en: Yeah. The Family has friends all over the world.
translation.ja: 世界中に友がいる

translation.ja: 〝シダーズ 大使の朝食〞 アフリカの外交官

translation.en: Russian nationals,
translation.ja: ロシア人

translation.en: congressmen, senators,
translation.ja: 連邦議員

translation.en: and that's when I realized: this is important. This is not just a fascinating story.
translation.ja: その時 これには 何か裏があると気づいた

translation.en: These are powerful people.
translation.ja: 権力の話だと

translation.en: Yeah, I'd heard about 'em, but it was more public lore.
translation.ja: うわさ話では 聞いたことがあった

translation.en: They weren't neighbors that you really got to know very well.
translation.ja: カーラ･ヴォン･ バーネウィッツ シダーズ近隣住民 知り合う機会は 少なかったけどね

translation.en: I got to know them because unfortunately one of their limousines ran over my cat.
translation.ja: 彼らの車がうちの猫を ひいて知り合った

translation.en: So there-- there were a couple of incidents like that.
translation.ja: そんなことが何度かあってね

translation.en: They didn't endear themselves to the neighborhood.
translation.ja: 近所付き合いはなかった

translation.en: Hey! Carla's here, too.
translation.ja: カーラじゃない

translation.ja: 文書を見つけたわ そう

translation.ja: ええ

translation.ja: 近隣住民との関係は― 近隣住民との関係は― メアリー･マカッチャン シダーズ近隣住民

translation.en: that you're either with them, or you're not with them.
translation.ja: メアリー･マカッチャン シダーズ近隣住民 両極端だったと思う

translation.ja: 彼らは近隣の 地図を持ってるのよ

translation.en: Did you know that they had a 3- by- 4- foot map of the neighborhood
translation.ja: 90×120センチの 大きな地図を持ってて

translation.en: with each house and a designated color,
translation.ja: 近隣の家が色分けされてる

translation.en: depending upon how supportive they were of the Fellowship?
translation.ja: フェローシップへの 支持に基づいてね

translation.en: Green, yellow, and red.
translation.ja: 緑　黄色　赤

translation.en: Support, indifference, or antagonism.
translation.ja: 支持　無関心　敵対よ

translation.en: - I forgot that, too. - So it's kind of like a war map.
translation.ja: 戦争地図みたい

translation.ja: 私は市民団体の 会長を務めてたから

translation.en: which is why I knocked on the door one day
translation.ja: ある日 彼らの家を訪問した

translation.en: and said, I'd like to find out just what this is all about.
translation.ja: “あなたたちの正体は？”と 聞いたの

translation.en: So this very nice man gave me a tour of the big house, the Cedars.
translation.ja: 感じのいい男性が 家を案内してくれた

translation.en: And it was very much mid- nineteenth- century.
translation.ja: 19世紀半ばの建物で

translation.en: Beautifully restored
translation.ja: 美しく修復されてた

translation.en: in the style of interior decoration you'd have if you want to impress people.
translation.ja: 訪問者に印象づけるような 内装になってた

translation.en: And then they gave me a tour of the boys' residence hall.
translation.ja: 青年たちの 住居にも案内してくれた

translation.en: And the boys are outside,
translation.ja: 青年たちは外で―

translation.en: landscaping and cleaning the gutters.
translation.ja: 庭仕事とゴミ拾いをしてた

translation.en: And the kids there said that they would continue to do this until God spoke to them
translation.ja: 神が自分に語りかけるまで 続けると言ってたわ

translation.en: and gave them their instructions for the rest of their life.
translation.ja: 人生の指針が 与えられるまでね

translation.en: And I said, I have to say that for a bunch of people in their 20s,
translation.ja: 私は言ったの “20代の若者にしては―”

translation.en: these are abnormally passive.
translation.ja: “ずいぶん受け身ね”って

translation.en: While I was in the boys' dormitory,
translation.ja: 青年たちの寮にいる時―

translation.en: one of them said, You know, we have a Tuesday night prayer meeting. Why don't you join us?
translation.ja: “火曜夜の祈りの会に 来ませんか？”と誘われた

translation.en: So I went to their Tuesday night prayer meetings, week after week after week.
translation.ja: そこから毎週 祈りの会に参加したわ

translation.en: What they offer their followers is a sense of belonging,
translation.ja: 帰属感を与えようと していたと思う

translation.en: a kind of unquestioning... We're with you through thick and thin.
translation.ja: いい時も悪い時も 無条件でそばにいるとね

translation.en: And there's something very alluring about that.
translation.ja: うっとりする感覚だった

translation.en: I wouldn't mind being accepted by a group of people... unquestioningly.
translation.ja: 何の疑いもなく 受け入れられるのはステキよ

translation.en: I only got a little glimpse of their theology,
translation.ja: 彼らの神学理論は 垣間見ただけだけど―

translation.en: and I really don't know about their form of Christianity,
translation.ja: どんな宗派なのか よくわからなかった

translation.en: or if even they are all Christians.
translation.ja: キリスト教かどうかすらも

translation.en: But when I learned how they're very unapologetically targeting
translation.ja: でも彼らが金持ちと権力者を 標的にしていると知った

translation.en: the rich and powerful,
translation.ja: 悪びれもせずね

translation.en: I found that to be disturbing.
translation.ja: 嫌な気持ちになったわ

translation.en: But I never asked any impolite questions.
translation.ja: 失礼な質問はしなかった

translation.en: I just sat and listened.
translation.ja: 座って話を聞いたの

translation.en: And then the following week, there was no prayer meeting.
translation.ja: 翌週は祈りの会が開かれず

translation.en: And there was no prayer meeting ever again after that.
translation.ja: そこから二度となかった

translation.en: I think they were trying to shake me off.
translation.ja: 私を排除したのね

translation.en: Okay. I know, I know. Just try to take a deep breath.
translation.ja: わかるよ　深呼吸して

translation.ja: 家にいる？

translation.en: I mean, wish I was there with you right now, I really do, but there's nothing I can do about it.
translation.ja: そばにいてあげたいけど 何もできない

translation.en: Because I can't just walk out of here!
translation.ja: ここから出られない

translation.en: Be calm.
translation.ja: だけど…　聞いてみるよ

translation.en: I will-- I'll ask them, okay? And maybe tomorrow, or--
translation.ja: だけど…　聞いてみるよ 明日には

translation.en: No, no, you can't come here.
translation.ja: いや　ここに来ちゃダメだ

translation.en: - Hey. -
translation.ja: やあ

translation.en: How are you?
translation.ja: 元気？

translation.en: - Yeah, it's good to hear your voice, too. -
translation.ja: 声が聞けてうれしい

translation.en: Yeah, no, I have a lot to tell you about, so...
translation.ja: ああ 話したいことがたくさんある

translation.en: Gonna have to confiscate that.
translation.ja: 没収させてもらう

translation.en: Let me call you back.
translation.ja: かけ直す

translation.en: All right, bye.
translation.ja: じゃあ

translation.en: I'm just kidding.
translation.ja: 冗談だよ

translation.en: Phone calls are allowed, but they're discouraged for new brothers. We want your full attention.
translation.ja: 電話は構わないけど 新入りは遠慮してほしい

translation.en: I was just, like, letting Luke have some time with his fiancee.
translation.ja: ルークと婚約者が 話してたから席を外した

translation.en: Luke's fiancee is a Jezebel.
translation.ja: ふしだらな女だ

translation.en: She doesn't obey God.
translation.ja: 神に従わない

translation.en: We're accountable to each other, Jeff. That's the brotherhood.
translation.ja: 僕らはお互いに責任を持つ

translation.en: I'm here to make sure you don't deviate from Christ's will.
translation.ja: 道を踏み外させたくない

translation.en: All right?
translation.ja: いいか？

translation.en: Okay.
translation.ja: ああ

translation.en: It's important to remember, these brothers, they were not bad guys.
translation.ja: 言っておきたいが 彼らは悪人ではなかった

translation.en: They were there because they wanted meaning in their life.
translation.ja: 人生に意味を見いだし―

translation.en: They wanted to feel like they were part of something valuable.
translation.ja: 有益な活動を したかっただけだ

translation.en: I remember one day, I'd been there for a while, and one of the brothers, he says, Guys, I have something for you to do.
translation.ja: それからしばらくたった時 誰かがある提案をした

translation.en: Arm wrestle.
translation.ja: 腕相撲だ

translation.en: And then someone yells, Fumble! and then suddenly,
translation.ja: その時 誰かが “ファンブル”と叫び

translation.en: they were all piling on me and, you know, hitting.
translation.ja: 僕にのしかかって 殴り出した

translation.en: - Get off me! Get off me! -
translation.ja: やめろ！　離せよ

translation.en: I said, get off me!
translation.ja: 離せったら！

translation.en: And at that time, I thought, This is really strange.
translation.ja: その時は変だと思ったが

translation.en: But as it turns out, there was actually a spiritual message to this.
translation.ja: 精神的な意図が あったとわかった

translation.en: The Jesus most of us are familiar with is tender and loving.
translation.ja: 我々の知るイエスは 優しく愛情に満ちている

translation.en: He's the lamb of God.
translation.ja: 神の子羊だ

translation.en: A figure of peace and gentleness.
translation.ja: 穏やかで優しい

translation.en: But no, their idea of Jesus-- Jesus' love is strong. As they'd said, Jesus is not a sissy.
translation.ja: だが彼らのイエスは 強い愛を持ち軟弱ではない

translation.en: And if Jesus was alive today, maybe he would be a Navy SEAL.
translation.ja: 今 生きていたら 海軍特殊部隊にいたり

translation.en: If Jesus was alive today, he'd be great at football.
translation.ja: アメフトをしてるイメージだ

translation.en: And so this was spiritual training.
translation.ja: これは精神的訓練だった

translation.en: It was a kind of muscular Christianity.
translation.ja: たくましいキリスト教だ

translation.en: And they were, as I came to understand, crushing Christ into me.
translation.ja: 僕にキリストを たたき込もうとしてた

translation.en: This was the initiation in which all our bodies became one.
translation.ja: みんなの肉体が１つとなる 通過儀礼だった

translation.en: I can't breathe! Guys, I can't breathe.
translation.ja: 息ができない！

translation.en: I can't breathe.
translation.ja: 苦しい

translation.en: Get off me.
translation.ja: 離せ

translation.en: One falls down, his friend can help him up.
translation.ja: 友として助け起こす

translation.en: You're one of us now.
translation.ja: これで仲間だ

translation.en: - Come on, circle up. - Phew!
translation.ja: 輪になって

translation.en: The brothers referred to our group as a family.
translation.ja: この集団の名は “ファミリー”

translation.en: And they said I'd become a member of the Family.
translation.ja: 僕はファミリーの 一員になった

translation.en: Or the Fellowship, as it's sometimes known.
translation.ja: フェローシップとも呼ぶ

translation.en: But the name is not important.
translation.ja: でも名称は重要ではない

translation.en: And sometimes I would make a mistake and refer to some political figure--
translation.ja: ある政治家が メンバーかと尋ねると

translation.en: Oh, so they're a member? Can we-- No, they are a friend of the Family.
translation.ja: “ファミリーの友人だ”と 訂正された

translation.en: There was all these subtle distinctions.
translation.ja: 微妙な差異がある

translation.en: And that's part of the invisibility of it.
translation.ja: それも秘密のうちだ

translation.en: I asked one time about the hierarchy, the organizational structure.
translation.ja: この組織に階層構造があるか 聞いたことがある

translation.en: And they said, Why do you keep talking about this?
translation.ja: 彼らは“なぜ そんな質問を？”と言った

translation.en: It's just me and you, you and you, and we are accountable to one another.
translation.ja: “僕と君 個人がお互いに 責任を持つんだ”

translation.en: And that's just the way God wants it.
translation.ja: それが神の望みだと

translation.en: It never occurred to me to, you know, sort of asked for an org chart.
translation.ja: 組織図があるか 聞かれたことはない

translation.en: Who are the people, how is it organized? What's the structure?
translation.ja: どんな階層構造に なってるかとかね

translation.en: And of course, the people who'd been around a long time were just really quick to say, Don't call it anything.
translation.ja: 長く在籍する人たちもいるが 肩書はない

translation.en: I'm like, You gotta call it something. So yeah, you kinda call it the Fellowship,
translation.ja: 単にフェローシップ(仲間)と 呼んだり

translation.en: or you call it a group of friends following Jesus, whatever it was.
translation.ja: イエスに従う 友のグループでもいい

translation.en: But definitions aside, you know, trying to stick a label on it,
translation.ja: レッテルを貼ることや 定義は脇に置いて―

translation.en: you see what's happening relationally,
translation.ja: ここの関係性を 見たほうがいい

translation.en: and where else is this happening?
translation.ja: こんな場所はどこにもない

translation.en: This is something that the world desperately needs.
translation.ja: 世界が必要としている

translation.en: Well, you're gonna have a shorter nose.
translation.ja: もっと鼻が低ければ…

translation.ja: 目的は 天下を取ることだろ？

translation.en: You have very intense eyes.
translation.ja: 集中してるな

translation.en: Thank you.
translation.ja: ありがとう

translation.ja: 旧約聖書の話をしよう

translation.ja: 善人の名を挙げて

translation.en: - Moses? - Noah?
translation.ja: モーゼ ノア

translation.en: David.
translation.ja: ダビデ

translation.en: King David, that's a good one.
translation.ja: ダビデ王か

translation.en: What would you say made him a good guy?
translation.ja: なぜ彼は善人？

translation.ja: 信仰心が強い

translation.en: King David liked to do some really bad things.
translation.ja: だが悪行ばかりしてた

translation.ja: 人妻のバトシバと 関係を持ち―

translation.en: And he basically murders her husband.
translation.ja: 夫を殺すよう仕向けた

translation.en: And this guy is supposedly one of our heroes?
translation.ja: そんなヤツが英雄か？

translation.en: Jiminy Christmas. God likes this guy.
translation.ja: 驚くことに神は彼を愛した

translation.en: What is that all about?
translation.ja: なぜだ？

translation.en: Is it because he tried?
translation.ja: 努力したから？

translation.en: He wanted to do the right thing.
translation.ja: 善行を行おうと

translation.en: Anyone else?
translation.ja: 他には？

translation.en: 'Cause he was chosen.
translation.ja: 選ばれたから

translation.en: Yeah. Chosen.
translation.ja: そうだ　選ばれし者だ

translation.ja: 興味深いだろ？

translation.ja: この中の誰かが 女の子を３人強姦したとする

translation.en: What would I think of you?
translation.ja: どう思う？

translation.en: That I'm a terrible person?
translation.ja: 悪人だと思う

translation.en: No, I wouldn't.
translation.ja: いや　違う

translation.en: That's not why I'm here. It's not my job to judge you.
translation.ja: 私の役目は 責めることじゃない
